messages: You have already started this task without finishing it

dimensions.name: truthfulness-1
dimensions.description: You are now asked to state how truthful the statement provided to you is.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: Choose the option that best fits your truthfulness judgment of the statement provided. Remember that a statement needs to be supported by facts to be true. Base your judgment on the parts of the explanation you have precedently highlighted and selected.

dimensions.name: explanation-quality
dimensions.description: You are now asked to evaluate the quality of the explanation given for the refuting/supporting of the statement.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: Choose the number, from 1 to 100, that best represent your judgment on the quality of the explanation you are provided. 1 means that the explanation is of very low quality, so it does not explain why that specific judgment was made, it is hard to understand and fails to provide reliable proof. 100 means that the explanation is of high quality, so it explains unequivocally, by showing proof, the reason why that judgment was made in a clear and understable manner.

dimensions.name: truthfulness-2
dimensions.description: You are now asked to gather proof to provide your very own judgment on the statement.

justification.text: Provide an explanation of high quality illustrating the reason(s) behind your judgment.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: By websearching using this textbox, choose the website that guided your judgment. Be mindful that you should not pick a website just by its title, you need to examine its contents before you provide it as proof.

instructions.label: Instruction
instructions.text: After your search, express your thruthfulness judgment on the statement, based on the website you have chosen as proof.

answers.truthfulness-2_justification: It's depends, because the film was produced by Trevor Macy and Jason Blum. So if we understand the claim as "the only one who produced the film" the claim is false eitherway it is true

notes.current_text: The claim says that the film was produced by Jason Blum. So, the answer must be false because the film was produced by Trevor Macy, not just Jason Blum
notes.raw_text: The claim says that the film was produced by Jason Blum. So, the answer must be false because the film was produced by Trevor Macy, not just Jason Blum
notes.text_left: The evidence says that the film was produced by Trevor Macy and Jason Blum.

response.name: Hush movie review & film summary (2016) | Roger Ebert
response.snippet: Powered by JustWatch Mike Flanagan ‚Äôs ‚ÄúHush,‚Äù which premiered at the SXSW Film Festival last month before popping up on Netflix today, is an old-fashioned home invasion thriller that works on its own modest terms. It‚Äôs one of those simple horror flicks that‚Äôs so streamlined it feels long even at only 82 minutes.

response.name: Hush (2016) Horror Film Review and Break Down - Copper Shock
response.snippet: Hush was penned by the director (Mike Flanagan) and the lead actress of the film (Kate Siegel). As a real-life married couple they were able to role play out the scenarios together. It‚Äôs likely why the climax of the film where the leading lady is playing out roles in her head of what does she do next and how does it end feels so solid.

response.name: 'Hush': A Movie Review - ReelRundown
response.snippet: The movie opens with Maddie Young preparing a meal. Close-up shots entice not only our visual senses but our audible senses‚Äîher knife slamming down onto the cutting board, the familiar sizzle as she adds food to a frying pan. As the camera pans around, the sounds slowly fade out and we're left with nothing but soft white noise.

response.snippet: The ‚Äútale‚Äù of The Winter‚Äôs Tale unfolds in scenes set sixteen years apart. In the first part of the play, Leontes, king of Sicilia, plays host to his friend Polixenes, king of Bohemia. Suddenly, Leontes becomes unreasonably jealous of Polixenes and Leontes‚Äôs pregnant wife, Hermione. Leontes calls for Polixenes to be killed, but he escapes.

response.name: The Winter's Tale - Shakespeare Study Guide
response.snippet: Climax. The climax of a play or a narrative work, such as a short story or a novel, can be defined as (1) the turning point at which the conflict begins to resolve itself for better or worse, or as (2) the final and most exciting event in a series of events. response.name: Summary of The Winter's Tale | Shakespeare Birthplace Trust

documents.explanation: The evidence says that the film was produced by Trevor Macy and Jason Blum. The claim says that the film was produced by Jason Blum. So, the answer must be false because the film was produced by Trevor Macy, not just Jason Blum.
documents.label: REFUTES

documents.explanation: The claim is that Winter's Tale was released in 1987. The evidence states that Winter's Tale is a 1983 novel by Mark Helprin. This is a novel, so it wasn't released in 1987. Therefore, the claim is false.
